articles.description:
Re @CodingMark @Andy8671025 @WholeMarsBlog Exactly. Ecosystem is almost entirely dependent on the sun already.

articles.author: Elon Musk
articles.description:
Re @WholeMarsBlog The primary solution to a sustainable energy future is solar/wind with batteries for when sun doesnâ€™t shine or wind doesnâ€™t blow, interconnected with conventional high voltage lines. No unknown technology is needed!
